original: @49a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dpal rdo rje rnam ba joms ba la phyag tshal lo

original: gzhan gyi rig sngags kyis byas pa mnan par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
analyzed: gzhan gyi rig sngags kyis byed ba gnon ba dod ba sgrub ba po dam tshig dang ldan ba

original: dur khrod kyi g-yam pa sngon po la dug dang khrag gis sna tshogs rdo rje bris la lte ba la che ge mo la rig sngags nan zhes pa bri /
analyzed: dur khrod kyi g-yam ba sngon po la dug dang khrag gis sna tshogs rdo rje bri la lte ba la che ge mo la rig sngags nan zhes ba bri

original: rva rnams la lam nan zhes pa bri /
analyzed: rva rnams la lam nan zhes ba bri

original: mu khyud la 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig sngags thams cad stam bha ya nan zhes pa bri /
analyzed: mu khyud la jig rten dang jig rten las da ba rig sngags thams cad stam bha ya nan zhes ba bri

original: de nas zhag gnyis sam gsum du aa mo gha badzra nan aom lam a'a: lam h'um lam zhes bzlas pas lam rgya gram dum nan pas bskal pa gnyis su de'i rig sngags kyi nus pa 'byung mi srid do //
analyzed: de nas zhag gnyis sam gsum du aa mo gha badzra nan aom lam aa: lam hum lam zhes bzlas ba lam rgya grams dum nan ba bskal ba gnyis su de rig sngags kyi nus ba byung mi srid do

original: gzhan gyi rig sngags mnan pa gser gyi ri bo zhes bya ba /
analyzed: gzhan gyi rig sngags gnon ba gser gyi ri bo zhes byed ba

original: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad ba rdzogs
